Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in St. Andrews, Fairmont St Andrews, Scotland is by the sea and close to East Sands and St. Andrew's Cathedral. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of St. Andrews Preservation Trust Museum and Garden and St. Andrew's Castle.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 209 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. While the golfer in the family is out on the course, you can enjoy above-par recreational amenities such as a health club and an indoor pool. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), supervised childcare/activities, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 6 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 6 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in St. Andrews, Fairmont St Andrews, Scotland is by the sea and close to East Sands and St. Andrew's Cathedral. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of St. Andrews Preservation Trust Museum and Garden and St. Andrew's Castle.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

East Sands - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
St. Andrew's Cathedral - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
St. Andrews Preservation Trust Museum and Garden - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
St. Andrew's Castle - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
University of St. Andrews - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
St. Andrews Aquarium - 4.9 km / 3 mi
St. Andrews Botanic Garden - 5 km / 3.1 mi
West Sands - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Scotland's Secret Bunker - 6 km / 3.7 mi
St. Andrew Links - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Crail Museum and Heritage Centre - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Jerdan Gallery - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Kellie Castle - 9.6 km / 5.9 mi
Scottish Fisheries Museum - 11.2 km / 7 mi
Anstruther Golf Club - 11.5 km / 7.1 mi

The preferred airport for Fairmont St Andrews, Scotland is Edinburgh (EDI) - 57 km / 35.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Fairmont St Andrews, Scotland is Edinburgh (EDI) - 56.8 km / 35.3 mi.
